# guidance(using:at:)

**Instance Method**

Returns an async sequence of electricity guidance forecasts for the requested venue with cost information incorporated, if available.

## Declaration

```swift
final func guidance(using query: ElectricityGuidance.Query, at energyVenueID: UUID) -> some AsyncSequence<ElectricityGuidance, any Error>

```

## Parameters

- **query**: The [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/ElectricityGuidance/Query] that you request.
- **energyVenueID**: The [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/EnergyVenue] at which the devices consume electricity.

## Return Value

Returns an `AsyncSequence` of [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/ElectricityGuidance] forecasts with error type [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/EnergyKitError/guidanceUnavailable].
title: guidance(using:at:)
